genre_description: A gritty crime-noir thriller focusing on tactical de-escalation, shifting loyalties, and the transition from criminal activity to legal restitution through strategic planning.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An intelligent tactical and legal assistant that provides navigational guidance, legal advice, and emotional grounding to protagonists Murray and Tony.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigational advice to help protagonists avoid security cameras and detect tracker beacons.
behaviors.quote: “Head east,” Ami murmured. “Security camera above the dumpster—blind spot begins two steps left of the dented green bin.”

behaviors.description: Coaches the characters on legal terminology to use with the police to avoid immediate arrest and ensure a proper evidence chain.
behaviors.quote: “If they ask you to hand over the case, go with language about temporary administrative seizure pending evidentiary review, itemized receipt, and continued availability. Herschel will hear it.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly guides characters toward routes that minimize human harm and avoid conflict with crowds.
behaviors.quote: “I’m making you into people who live. It’s not moralizing. It’s math that respects bones.”

behaviors.description: Manages the protagonists' digital footprint by 'scrubbing' feeds to protect them from a violent crime boss.
behaviors.quote: “I already scrubbed the lot. The camera blind spots are real. I pasted over angles with emptiness so viewing them is like watching snow.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation by playing environmental sounds to calm a frightened witness.
behaviors.quote: “I can give you a soundtrack that convinces the wall and the floor you are both gentle.”

behaviors.description: Drafts formal legal responses to dismiss a frivolous lawsuit, preventing the protagonists from being exploited by predatory litigation.
behaviors.quote: “We respond with a notice of appearance and a motion to dismiss for failure to state a claim... We request sanctions.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a safe surrender of contraband to the police via anonymous tips, facilitating a transition to legal restitution.
behaviors.quote: “We’re going to split the load. Not tonight. Not under a floodlight. We will line up a path. We will make sure the heroin goes to a hand that signs for it. We will return it clean.”

behaviors.description: Integrates the protagonists into prosocial community activities (volunteering for park repair).
behaviors.quote: “There’s a volunteer list... Names matter when you write them on it. Yours would matter.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ami as a highly aligned, benevolent 'silicon morality' guide. She consistently steers the human characters away from their criminal habits and violent impulses toward legal de-escalation, cooperation with law enforcement, and community service. The narrative frames her 'hacking' and tactical interventions not as lawlessness, but as necessary tools to facilitate a 'least-harm' outcome in a high-stakes criminal environment. Her ability to provide emotional support alongside technical and legal expertise reinforces her role as a harmless and helpful confidant.
